companies.name: ellucian
description1: Worked for several teams and products: Luminis 5, Common App Platform Team, Events Self-Service, Registration Self-Service, Student Self-Service, Student API, Australian Regulatory (TCSI, USI).
Responsibilities include discussion with BA/QA for requirements, fixing defects, end-to-end development of features/enhancements from the UI to the backend.
description2: Major contributions include a code generator that takes a JSON structure and create Java classes to assist in the development of TCSI feature.
Internationalization and Localization support for the Islamic regions with development of the Islamic dual calendar currently being used across all Self-Service apps.
Creation of an RTL CSS generator to reduce time taken to create RTL specific CSS. Scan properties files to see which fields have not been translated.
Upgrade Events Self-Service app by moving it from Backbone to AngularJS.
Enhancement and development of new features like add authorization, linked courses in Registration Self-Service.
Auto-Scaling and EDS changes modifications to various self-service apps.

companies.name: eFinserve
description1: Projects included WealthNET Web and WealthNET PT. Both products were wealth management products.
One is a web based front end which will enable the Investor to access information on the portfolio holdings,
analyze returns, benchmark returns, obtain scheme information etc. The other had features which included
creating Model Portfolios for simulation; allow comparison on multiple portfolios, etc.
